name: Ascendants: Power Rising
description:
The long-lost ascendants are back. But what is this? They are an enemy now? They even ascended themselves! Discover what lies beyond this mystery. Collect all the elemental orbs that re-emerged and use them to re-create the Ascension Orb. Your enemies are ascended, it's time that you ascend too.

GAME FEATURES:
- Classic RPG!
- Explore the vast world of the ascendants!
- Discover secret dungeons and find hidden treasures!
- Search for Mystic Fruits that permanently increases hp when consumed!
- Travel through the land and the sea!
- Climb mountains, explore mysterious caves, survive in a jungle, cross a desert, stay cool in scorching lands, and many more!
- Use a Teleport Scroll to instantly travel in different places!
- Complete Quests that are filled with adventure, mysteries, and thrilling battles!
- Hunt for monsters that have the ingredients to Craft items, weapons, and armors!
- Set bonus, rewards using a complete set of equipment! Each set of equipment have unique Set bonus that provide unique effects!
- Each skills are unique!
- You will never spam just one powerful skill, you need different kinds of strategy in every battle!
- Each monsters have their own skillset too! And they have a smart AI! Making battles more challenging!
- Watch your health bar at all times because in every battle, you don't just attack, you need to think of your defense too!


Found a bug?
